data.title: David Burtka
data.meta_description: David Burtka. Actor: Harold & Kumar - Alle Jahre wieder. David Burtka was born on 29 May 1975 in Dearborn, Michigan, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Harold & Kumar - Alle Jahre wieder (2011), Neil's Puppet Dreams (2012) and CSI: New York (2004). He has been married to Neil Patrick Harris since 6 September 2014. They have two children.
data.text:
Has twin children (born by surrogate) with current partner Neil Patrick Harris'. The twins were born on October 12th, 2010. Their son is named Gideon Scott and their daughter is named Harper Grace.

Helped raise his former partner Lane Janger's two children (born by surrogate in 2000) though they are not his own biological children, according to current partner Neil Patrick Harris's Fall 2008 interview with "Out" magazine. Lane's son is named Javin and Lane's daughter is named Flynn.

In addition to his culinary arts degree from Pasadena's Le Cordon Bleu, Burtka trained under chef Mario Batali at Batali's New York restaurant, Babbo, and with chef and author Gina DePalma.

I always thought that family was the most important thing in life, and no matter what I do, whether being a chef or an actor or a dancer, being a dad is what I do best.
